Job Description: Proficiency in Java and J2EE, JSP, Servlets, Struts, Hibernate, Spring, XML and Web services.      2 Expertise in Object-oriented software analysis, design, development testing.      3 Basic knowledge in RDBMS such as DDL DML queries.      4 Knowledge of design patterns and excellent in troubleshooting skills.      5 Knowledge of Liferay DXP will be an added advantage.      6 Candidates who are willing to make career in Liferay will be prefered      7 Publishes Unit Test results in specified format and frequency.
UG: Any Graduate in Any Specialization, B.Tech/B.E. in Production/Industrial
